// Tool for tracking and labeling animation/component state
var log=console.log;export var framerLogger=function framerLogger(label){return log("%c".concat(label,": animation complete"),"color: red");};export var stateLogger=function stateLogger(label,mounted){mounted?log("%c".concat(label,": mounted"),"color: green"):log("%c".concat(label,": unmounted"),"color: orange");};
